div.p: The authors would like to acknowledge the India Meteorological Department (IMD), Giovanni-NASA, Bhuvan-ISRO, NGDC (NOAA) and NCEP-NCAR for providing all the datasets free of cost. The authors acknowledge UDel_AirT_Precip data provided by the NOAA/OAR/ESRL PSD, Boulder, Colorado, USA, from their web site at https://www.esrl.noaa.gov/psd/. The authors also thank IIT Bhubaneswar for providing all the necessary infrastructure for carrying out this study. Lastly, the authors would like to acknowledge DST-UKIERI (UKIERI-DST-2014-15-046) and ISRO-ARFI projects for providing financial support to carry out some of the analysis used in the study. P.P.G. would like to thank MHRD, Government of India for providing fellowship for his graduate research. The authors also gratefully acknowledge the constructive reviews by Prof. Dev Niyogi and the anonymous reviewers whose comments and suggestions have greatly improved the manuscript.
